name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six
description: Uses dgvoodoo Graphics Api Wrapper by Dege. Official website http://dege.fw.hu

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Red Storm Entertainment/Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six/RainbowSix.exe

extract.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Red Storm Entertainment/Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six

write_config.file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Red Storm Entertainment/Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six/dgVoodoo.conf

content:
files:
- dgvoodoo: https://lutris.net/files/tools/dgvoodoo_2.55.4_dx1-7.tar.xz
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Red Storm Entertainment/Tom Clancy's Rainbow
    Six/RainbowSix.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win98
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: $DISC/SETUP.EXE
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Red Storm Entertainment/Tom Clancy's Rainbow
      Six
    file: dgvoodoo
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Red Storm Entertainment/Tom Clancy's Rainbow
      Six/dgVoodoo.conf
    key: dgVoodooWatermark
    section: DirectX
    value: false
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    ddraw: native
